p: Population data for the US were obtained from publicly-available combined files of United States Census Bureau data available via the National Bureau of Economic Research. US birth data were downloaded from the Centers for Disease Control. Demographic data for Mexico were obtained from the Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Geografía. Annual county (US) and state (Mexico) population estimates from these sources were interpolated at the weekly level using a cubic spline to avoid stepwise jumps at year transitions.
